title: ShiBhu single-page thought leadership portfolio (responsive)

requirements.text: Create a single-page responsive portfolio website for “ShiBhu - Thought Leadership Portfolio” that matches the structure and content from the provided HTML (header, sticky navigation, Articles, Expertise, Career Overview/Stats, About, Footer).
acceptanceCriteria: The app renders as a single-page layout with sections: Header, Navigation, Articles, Core Expertise, Career Overview, About, Footer.
Navigation links scroll to the corresponding section IDs (#articles, #expertise, #stats, #about).
All user-facing text content matches the provided HTML (name, tagline, section headings, article titles/descriptions/links, stats, footer copy).
Layout is responsive and usable on mobile (≤768px) and desktop.

requirements.text: Implement the Header section with the provided content: name “Shivasankari Bhuvaneswaran”, tagline, and the five expertise tags (Global Capability Centers, Marketplace Platforms, Finance & Risk, Technology Leadership, Telecom Strategy) displayed as pills.

quotes:
Shivasankari Bhuvaneswaran

Strategic Business Writer | Thought Leader | Enterprise Transformation

...

acceptanceCriteria: Header uses a dark gradient background and centered typography similar to the provided HTML design.
Expertise tags render as pill/badge UI elements and wrap on smaller screens.

requirements.text: Implement a sticky top Navigation bar with links: Articles, Expertise, Portfolio (anchors to #stats), About, styled as a light bar with hover accent behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation remains visible at the top while scrolling (sticky).
Hover and focus states are visible and accessible.
Clicking a link scrolls to the correct section.

requirements.text: Implement the Articles section with categorized groups and responsive article-card grid; each card must include title, platform badge, date, description, and an outbound link that opens in a new tab.

quotes:
Published Thought Leadership

Global Capability Centers & Organizational Models

...
...

acceptanceCriteria: Each category heading is shown exactly as provided: “Global Capability Centers & Organizational Models”, “Marketplace Platforms & Ecosystem Strategy”, “Finance & Risk Management”, “Technology Leadership & Digital Transformation”, “Energy & Utilities Sector Strategy”.
Cards render in a responsive grid (one column on small screens; multiple columns on larger screens).
Each card includes the exact URLs provided and uses target="_blank" with appropriate rel attributes for security.
Hover interaction includes a subtle lift and shadow effect similar to the provided HTML.

requirements.text: Implement the Core Expertise section as a responsive grid of expertise items with the provided titles and descriptions.
acceptanceCriteria: Expertise items render as cards/blocks with a clear visual accent (e.g., left border accent) consistent with the design system.
Grid responds gracefully from mobile to desktop.

requirements.text: Implement the Career Overview/Stats section with the four provided stats (700+ Published Articles, 50+ Publication Platforms, 9 Expertise Domains, 12 Years Experience) in a responsive grid.
acceptanceCriteria: Stats render as uniform cards with a prominent number and a label.
Layout adapts to screen size (stacking on mobile).

requirements.text: Implement the About section with the provided two-paragraph bio text, centered and constrained to a readable width.
acceptanceCriteria: About text matches exactly and remains readable on mobile and desktop (sensible max width, line height).

requirements.text: Implement the Footer with the provided copyright line and “Portfolio Last Updated: February 15, 2026”.

quotes:
© 2026 ShiBhu. All rights reserved.

Portfolio Last Updated: February 15, 2026

acceptanceCriteria: Footer renders with dark background and light text, centered.
Footer text matches exactly.

requirements.text: Establish a coherent visual theme using Tailwind CSS inspired by the provided HTML/CSS (dark hero gradient, off-white surfaces, light-gray section backgrounds, subtle borders, and a single accent color similar to #0066cc) and apply it consistently across typography, spacing, cards, and section dividers. Do not use a blue+purple dual theme.
acceptanceCriteria: A single accent color is used consistently for highlights (e.g., section underline, platform badge, links).
Sections have consistent spacing and visual separation similar to the provided design (dividers/borders).
Typography hierarchy is clear (H1, section H2, category headings, card titles).

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Frontend must be implemented using the existing React + TypeScript + Tailwind + shadcn/ui setup; do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
No backend is required for this static portfolio unless strictly necessary; keep content as frontend data/constants.
nonGoals: Adding authentication (Internet Identity) or user accounts.
Adding a CMS/editor UI for managing articles.
Fetching articles from external APIs or scraping the provided URLs.
Adding multi-page routing beyond a single-page layout.
